name: Crap: A Crime Story
description:
WASD: Directions
R: Restart level
LShift: Change overlay mode ("Path", "Cube", and "Off")
        Path: Display how to move to adjacent faces.
        Cube: Display location of adjacent faces.
M: Mute music

"I played his games. His favorite was craps."

An entry in the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022.

Learn the intricacies of rolling a die along a grid. Listen to a short story of love, loss, and betrayal.

  • Place the correct face (and possibly orientation) on the goal to proceed.
  • Unlock doors in much the same manner.
  • "Seven-out" your foes by adding to seven. They're standing in your way.
  • Speed through nine bite-sized levels.

After all, it was worth it in the end, wasn't it?

[ Completion time: 5-10 minutes ]
